homepage.name: Edward Wee
homepage.description: I am an aspiring software engineer who has experience of developing mobile and web applications. I am currently in my final year of studies for a Bachelor in Computer Science majoring in computer systems and networking at University of Malaya and are looking for career opportunities.

education_1.description: Studied Pure Science with straight A's ( 2A+ , 6A , 1A-)

education_2.description: Studied Pure Science with a CGPA of 3.83 ( 3A , 1B+ )

education_3.experience: Bachelor of Computer Science at UM
education_3.description: Specialised in Computer Systems and Networking in University of Malaya with a CGPA of 3.96

professional_1.description: Our team consisted of 6 people have taken a task from University of New South Wales to develop a security assessment web application. I am a backend engineer for this project.

professional_2.description: Carried out industrial training as a software engineer. Learned how to design and develop scalable mobile and web application. Learned how to develop backend of an application and Docker.

professional_3.description: Collaborated with Cognixus Technologies to develop a performance review plugin for the existing Hexfere HRMS system.

contact_page.subtitle: WANT TO GET IN TOUCH? HERE'S HOW YOU CAN REACH ME.

project_1.title: BeFitter
project_1.description: A simple exercise blog that is build using Django. Throughout the project, I have been exposed to the basics of web development primarily in HTML and CSS. Besides that, I have also learned how to utilise and deploy Django application on Heroku with this project.

project_2.title: Anime Tracker
project_2.description: Anime Tracker fetches data from Jikan API and allows users to perform CRUD operations. This project has exposed me to usage of REST API to link my React Frontend and Django Backend together.

project_3.title: Algorithm Class Project (Shortest Distance Between 2 Locations)
project_3.description: We have been tasked to create an application that calculates the shortest drivable distance between two locations input by the user. We have used Map Box API and utilised min-heap algorithm to calculate and decide the shortest distance provided by Map Box API.

project_4.title: Pay It Forward Mobile Application
project_4.description: Pay It Forward (PIF) is a platform for promoting a caring community through the spirit of sharing and paying forward. Throughout the development of this project, I have learned how to implement UI/UX designs, business logics, state management and unit testing using the Flutter framework. Furthermore, I have also gained valuable experience on the development of industrial level mobile applications.

project_5.title: Pay It Forward Website
project_5.description: A fellow intern from UM and I have been tasked to develop a website for Pay It Forward (PIF). I have learned how to develop responsive website using Nuxt Js that has language switching functionality using i18n service and email validation using vee-validate. I have also learned how to write Docker commands and deploy the Docker image to Kubernetes Cluster.

project_6.title: Hexfere HRMS Jetson Nano Web Application
project_6.description: Created a web application to using Flask allowing the ML team to integrate it's facial recognition technology into it. The micro-framework Flask reduces the resource utilisation and allows Jetson Nano to allocate more resources for the facial recognition technology.

project_7.title: Digital Resilience SBX
project_7.description: We,a group consist of 6 members from University of Malaya have been commissioned by Dr Yenni Tim from The University of New South Wales to create a prototype of Cyber Security Assessment Web application. I am responsible for the backend development of the project together with my group leader. Throughout the project, I have learned how to design database, implementing the designs in Django by writing the models and creating API's for CRUD operations. I have also learned how to conduct unit testing and customise Django Admin Page. Furthermore, I have also learned how to setup Docker and Docker Compose to allow us to deploy as a droplet in Digital Ocean.

project_8.title: Expense Tracker
project_8.description: Started Expense Tracker project to further enhance my mobile development skillsets. I have learned deeper about Flutter's State Management (Cubit and State). Furthermore, I have also learned how to perform CRUD operations through utilising Firebase's Firestore as a No SQL database.

project_9.title: Portfolio Website V2
project_9.description: Decided to apply the skills I have learned on my internship to rebuild my portfolio webpage using Nuxt Js and hosted on Netlify. This is my old portfolio website, https://edwardweeold.netlify.app/ before undergoing internship. Have applied mobile responsive design on current portfolio website.
